comments: Not even a full HD stream, wow. The ISS has a 4k live stream camera, guys. I don't want to bash it, I love the idea, but it shouts and screams "minimum effort". I should also mention the ads that take 1/4 of the phone's screen. I'll go watch somewhere else until you decide you're doing this out of passion and not for money. Let's be honest, whoever is downloading this for long term use must be passionate about space. And yes, I know I could pay for ad free version, but this app is not worth it.

I saw the ISS in the sky for the first time today thanks to this app. I was able to watch it fly over my house. Like a beautiful moving star. I knew exactly where to look for it thanks to the app. Absolutely brilliant. I loved being able to see this. I felt ridiculously excited knowing ISS was about to appear. It's unbelievable how fast it's going around the globe. The things in the menu are so interesting to watch as well and it makes seeing the ISS fly above you for real even more exciting‚ù§Ô∏è

Ive had this great app for many years now and I love the view of the the Earth from the ISS , I do wish there were more down views of the Earth other that , I will watching this app from NASA for many years to come . The space walks are amazing to watch and the talks from the peaple in space are very educational to this old timer and my young daughter. One other thing I have to say is please keep up your great work that you are doing . Thank you .

Okay, yes it works. And I paid to get rid of the ads as soon as it seemed to be working. I look forward to having at the Earth. Earth gazing. Spinning around. Staring at the ground. Maybe I will get to see a ufo someday. I pray.
Love it but.... instead of notification of daylight notification, why not daylight and sunset in 5 minutes. They are often spectacular without prior notification.

title: CameraFi Live ICE -Old Version
description:
[IMPORTANT NOTICE]
The minimum supported Android version of CameraFi Live ICE will be changed to 4.4 or higher from March.
- More Info: https://goo.gl/fXxA9z

 [App Description]
The CameraFi Live‚Ñ¢ allows you to live stream using not only smartphone camera, but also USB camera. It can be used in diverse fields such as entertainment, 


1) Broadcast your event with CameraFi Live.
You can invite your club members, family and friends to watch your live streaming video. Live streamed videos are saved automatically and you can also set broadcast privacy settings to watch the video only by yourself.


2) Professional video quality
Supports external camera connectivity. Able to live stream high quality videos through clear shooting and zoom function using USB cameras with high performance (camcorder, DSLR, etc.). Also, you can use your two hands freely while streaming or stream in your point of view through using wearable camera or subminiature camera.

[Note]
- (Youtube users) You need to enable "live" in your Google account settings to access this app. Enter https://www.youtube.com/live_streaming_signup to activate LIVE STREAM function.

[Features]
- Compatible Android version
 * Android version 4.4 and above(From March)

- Interfaces
   * Video Input:  built-in Camera, USB Camera, capture cards (HDMI, SDI, CVBS)
   * Audio Input:  in-Mic, UAC(USB Audio Class)
- Live Streaming
   * YouTube, USTREAM, and Custom RTMP (RTSP coming soon)
- Hardware-accelerated video encoding: H.264 adaptive bitrate streaming.
- Video Size
   * VGA resp. SD(640√ó480), HD(1280√ó720), FHD(1920x1080)

[Permission Details]
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE : To get photos
- RECORD_AUDIO : To record sound
- GET_ACCOUNTS : To automatically input email address while signing up
- CAMERA : To capture photos or videos

[Store]
 - You could buy 'CameraFi Live All-In-One Serial Key' in CameraFi Store.
    * http://www.camerafistore.com/

title: TOYA Live

TOYA wants to create a community where you can feel comfortable, where you can make new friends, you can communicate with friends and even face-to-face video chat. Popular people show their charm, make friends, and get fans. 
We have people from many regions and can recommend different content to you. You can also switch regions to meet different people.
Our current user base is very large, mainly young people from universities. But our goal is not limited to this, we hope to attract more groups, of course, this needs your help, if you have any suggestions, you can contact us.
